metadata.title: CVE-2023-35789 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the C AMQP client library (aka rabbitmq-c) through 0.13.0 for RabbitMQ. Credentials can only be entered on the command line (e.g., for amqp-publish or amqp-consume) and are thus visible to local attackers by listing a process and its arguments.

notes.note: mdeslaur> the upstream commit for this issue adds a new option to read a password from a file, but does not remove the option to specify a password on the command line

criterions.comment: librabbitmq package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
